title: API Integration Utility
description: A full-stack application for managing and testing API integrations, built with .NET Core and React. Features secure authentication, API endpoint management, real-time testing, and PostgreSQL database integration.
features: User authentication with JWT and password validation
API endpoint management and testing interface
Real-time response display with status codes and response time
PostgreSQL database with Entity Framework Core

title: AutoScale Self-Adaptive System
description: A sophisticated self-adaptive system for managing and adapting microservices-based cloud applications following the MAPE-K (Monitor Analyze Plan Execute-Knowledge) adaptation loop. Implements automated scaling and resource management for Kubernetes deployments.
features: MAPE-K adaptation loop implementation (Monitor, Analyze, Plan, Execute, Knowledge)
Multi-service support (auth, booking, customer, flight services)

title: Phoneme Recognition for CAPT
description: Implementation of various deep learning models for phoneme recognition with applications to Computer-Aided Pronunciation Training (CAPT). Explored DNN, RNN, CNN+RNN, and Wav2Vec2 models on the DARPA TIMIT dataset for real-time pronunciation training.
features: Multiple deep learning model implementations (DNN, RNN, CNN+RNN, Wav2Vec2)
DARPA TIMIT dataset preprocessing and feature extraction
Comprehensive performance analysis and model comparison

title: Furhat Conversational System
description: Building an LLM-driven conversational system for the Furhat social robot to help newcomers adapt to the Canadian job market. Focused on multimodal interaction and contextual reasoning.

title: IngreCheck
description: Built an OCR + RAG-based dietary compliance tool integrating Amazon Textract and LangChain. Hosted on AWS (EC2, ASG, ELB, S3) with CloudWatch monitoring. Provided real-time dietary restriction alerts from extracted ingredients.
features: OCR-based ingredient extraction using Amazon Textract
RAG pipeline for dietary compliance analysis
AWS cloud deployment (EC2, ASG, ELB, S3)

title: QT Robot Therapy App
description: Developed a real-time therapy web application for the QT Robot using Flask, WebSockets, JavaScript, and multithreading. Integrated speech analysis using Librosa and Praat.
features: Speech data analysis (pitch, pauses, speech rate)
